channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No streetlamps on entire street, 2nd November
item.description:
There has been no lighting on Sterry Street and Southall place for over a year This is very frightening especially now that the clocks have gone back . This needs sorting immediately before there is an accident or something worse .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southall Place, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped silver Vauxhall astra, 2nd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 193, High Street, Poverest, Orpington, London

item.title: Serious water on pavememt due to lack on drainage, 2nd November
item.description:
